name: Scrap.tf Custom template
description:
The template feature exported to stylish from Scraptf-Stylizer.
The most complete stylish template for scrap.tf
additional_info:
Scrap.tf Custom template is just a part of Scraptf-Stylizer, if you are on chrome or opera and you want more other features added on scraptf you can take it instead of this stylish template.

Opera : https://addons.opera.com/fr/extensions/details/scraptf-stylizer
Chrome: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/scraptf-stylizer/gjejbbmaadafncfilaidnlbchdlppggg

---------------------

# Changelog

v1.0.0 [26/02/2017] ~ Hello World

- Welcome to "Scrap.tf Custom template" on stylish

style_setting_options.label: Raffle message with default background & text color
